name: terraform-provider-libvirt
description: Terraform provisioning with Linux KVM using libvirt

repo.name: terraform-provider-libvirt
repo.description: Terraform provider to provision infrastructure with Linux's KVM using libvirt

readme.summary: Comprehensive, well-structured README with excellent clarity and examples, though troubleshooting section could be expanded and the migration guide appears incomplete.
readme.top_issue: The migration guide section is cut off mid-sentence ('used the source attribute o'), leaving users unable to complete a critical migration task from v0.8.x to v0.9+

injection_risks.description: The `generateModel`, `generateSchema`, and `generateConvert` functions use template files to generate code. While this is not directly an injection risk, it's essential to ensure that the templates are properly sanitized and validated.

The `UnmarshalDomainXML` function deserializes XML data from a string. Although it uses a library to handle the unmarshaling, it's crucial to validate and sanitize the input data to prevent potential XML injection attacks.

security.summary: The codebase has some potential security concerns related to injection risks and input validation, but overall, it appears to be well-structured and secure.

common_complaints: Schema changes in v0.9.1 broke examples and caused validation errors
Documentation and examples out of sync with current API
Complex configuration syntax causing 'inconsistent result after apply' errors
Disk and volume resource parameter changes not well documented
Lack of working examples for new v0.9+ schema
praise_themes: Community members sharing solutions and workarounds
Users proactively creating functional examples for others
sentiment.summary: Moderate community health with significant frustration around poorly-managed v0.9.1 API changes; many unresolved issues with minimal maintainer engagement despite recent activity, suggesting maintenance burden exceeds current resources.

red_flags: Repeatedly closing PRs for legacy provider
Lack of clear guidance on where to contribute
communication.summary: Maintainer responses are generally helpful and clear, but could be more welcoming and provide clearer direction.

concerns: 27 open issues with no resolution activity
No merged PRs in past 6 months
No active contributors in past 6 months
No releases since at least 6 months ago
Last commit was over a month ago (2025-11-30)
maintenance.summary: This package is effectively abandoned with zero maintenance activity over the past 6 months and accumulating unresolved issues.

project_metrics.description: Terraform provider to provision infrastructure with Linux's KVM using libvirt

analysis_summary.doc_summary: The documentation is generally well-structured and provides a good overview of the package's functionality, but could benefit from more detailed installation instructions and troubleshooting guidance.
concerns: Docs: Lack of clear and concise troubleshooting section
Community: libvirt_volume examples and definitions issues
Communication: Repeatedly closing PRs for legacy provider
Communication: Lack of clear guidance on where to contribute
High bus factor risk (97% from top contributor)
highlights: High number of commits in the past six months (168)
Recent release on the same day as a significant commit activity
Multiple contributors active in the last six months
